data.title: AY HEL Schengen Lounge from 09JUL24
data.meta_description: Finnair | Finnair Plus - AY HEL Schengen Lounge from 09JUL24 - Originally Posted by koskiflyer Does anyone know if the new lounge will also open at 5:30? Schengen side Located near gate 21 (3rd floor) Open daily 5 a.m.–12 a.m. (midnight) Breakfast buffet until 10.30 a.m. Lunch and dinner buffet after 10.30 a.m.
data.text:
Jul 9, 2024, 2:11 pm

Location: Helsinki-Vantaa APT, Finland

Programs: AY LUMO

Posts: 6,127

Quote:

Originally Posted by koskiflyer

Does anyone know if the new lounge will also open at 5:30?

Quote:

Schengen side

Located near gate 21 (3rd floor)

Open daily 5 a.m.–12 a.m. (midnight)

Breakfast buffet until 10.30 a.m.

Lunch and dinner buffet after 10.30 a.m.

Quote:

Finnair Business Lounge and Platinum Corner on the Schengen side

Breakfast buffet every morning until 10.30 a.m.

Soup and salad from a buffet with a hot main course (the main course can be vegetarian or with meat or fish) and dessert after 10.30 a.m. until 11.30 p.m.

Our menu rotates every two weeks to offer variations if you travel with us often

A selection of wines, sparkling wine, beer, Finnish long drink and non-alcoholic beverages is available for you to enjoy throughout the day

F&B info from website.

5 am? I was there this morning at 4:50 am and it was closed, of course. No opening hours shown anywhere and I assumed 5:30 am so I sat in an empty gate area until 5:15 before going to my gate. Too bad I didn't chek out FT this morning!
